titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2328) to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to reauthorize the Clean Lakes Program.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-571, by Mr. Reynolds.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2328 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Makes in order the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure amendment in the nature of a substitute, now printed in the bill, as an original bill for the purpose of amendment. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 200.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 468.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/11/2000--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 2328 (Clean Lakes Program reauthorization).
